name: Wordle Discord Bot
description: I built a wordle bot on Discord. The bot was created with the help of discord and other npm packages. Deployed the bot using Heroku cloud platform.

name: Premier League Predictor
description: An algorithm that predicts premier league games using the Poisson distribution to determine the chances of an event happening again. Used premier league away and home goals history to predict win chances.

name: GPA Calculator
description: A webapp that calculates the GPA for a given credits and letter grades. Developed using VanillaJS, HTML, and CSS. Used GitHub pages to deploy the website.
